body_html: @ibab The TensorReduction.h code is very optimized and therefore pretty complex. A simpler operation that you could use as a template is TensorReverse.h (which reverse the order of the coefficients along one or more dimensions) or TensorShuffling.h (which reorders the dimension - this is a transposition in the 2d case)

body: @ibab The TensorReduction.h code is very optimized and therefore pretty complex. A simpler operation that you could use as a template is TensorReverse.h (which reverse the order of the coefficients along one or more dimensions) or TensorShuffling.h (which reorders the dimension - this is a transposition in the 2d case)
